entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:07 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 5:30 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %

Dewpoint: -14.7°C

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to freezing rain or rain before morning. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then east 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
